description:
Abigail, one of the Dark Rebel Armies` Four Divine Kings, proposes that they use the curse of Accused to find out if Nei`s pledge to kill Dark Schneider is genuine. She agrees to be cursed and gets doomed to a duel to the death against Dark Schneider. As Nei launches an assault on the Kingdom of Meta-llicana, former Four Divine Kings member Gara welcomes them with a counterattack!
Source: Official Website
